mapper.select: SELECT ifmmSeq , ifmmAdminNy , ifmmId , ifmmName , ifmmDesc FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmId = #{ifmmId} AND ifmmPwd = #{ifmmPwd}

SELECT a.ifmmName , b.ifmeEmailFull , c.ifmpNumber , d.ifmaAddress1 , d.ifmaAddress2 FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberEmail b ON b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND b.ifmeDefaultNy = 1 LEFT JOIN infrMemberPhone c ON c.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND c.ifmpDeviceCd = 26 AND c.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 LEFT JOIN infrMemberAddress d ON d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq AND d.ifmaDefaultNy = 1 AND d.ifmaTypeCd = 42 WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
